page.title: 16Gowerton Riding Centre.
page.content: Gowerton Riding Centre is one of the local tourist attractions in our area. They have twenty six horses and a few ponies in the stables. The lessons cost Â£3.50 for a private half hour lesson and Â£3.50 for an hour if you are part of a class.The Centre also caters for resedential courses where you can camp on the farm and have riding lessons too. The Centre has a tack room where they keep all the equipment and a feed shed where the food such as bran,barley oats and horsenuts are kept.The vet comes every fortnight to check the health of the horses and to see that they are not working too hard.The stables are mucked out every day and disinfected at the weekend so the horses are kept very clean.After their working life is over the horses are sold to a good,caring home.
